item.title: Inside the Biden Administration’s Unpublished Report on AI Safety
item.description: The US government conducted a groundbreaking study on frontier models—and never published the results.

item.title: At $250 million, top AI salaries dwarf those of the Manhattan Project and the Space Race
item.description: A 24 year-old AI researcher will earn 327x what Oppenheimer made while developing the atomic bomb.

item.title: Is Silicon Valley Losing Its Influence on DC?
item.description: This episode of Uncanny Valley covers black holes, woke AI, and the relationship between Silicon Valley billionaires and the Trump Administration.

item.title: The GOP's Message for Tech Billionaires: Be Like Peter Thiel
item.description: One lesson Republican insiders took away from Elon Musk’s spectacular flameout? Be wary of billionaires who love the spotlight.

item.title: The GOP's Message for Tech Billionaires: Be Like Peter Thiel

item.title: Silicon Valley AI Startups Are Embracing China’s Controversial ‘996’ Work Schedule
item.description: In an industry once known for cushy perks, some founders are now asking staff to commit to a 72-hour weekly schedule. You’re either in or you’re out.
